citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC did not complete reviews of the facility's program for humane care and use of animals every 6 months as
required in 2023. There was only one program review completed in 2023 on April 13, 2023. There were no other program
reviews completed until April 11, 2024.
Regular reviews are necessary to ensure IACUC oversight of the program and to ensure the welfare of the animals being
used in research by the facility. With respect to activities involving animals, the IACUC, as an agent of the research
facility, shall review at least once every 6 months, the research facility’s program for humane care and use of animals.
Correct by ensuring the IACUC reviews the facility's program for humane care and use of animals at least once every six
months from August 27, 2024 forward.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC did not complete reviews of the animal facilities every 6 months as required in 2023. There was only one
facility review completed in 2023 on April 13, 2023. There were no other facility reviews completed until April 11, 2024.
Regular reviews are necessary to ensure IACUC oversight of the program and to ensure the welfare of the animals being
used in research by the facility. With respect to activities involving animals, the IACUC, as an agent of the research
facility, shall inspect at least once every six months, all of the research facility’s animal facilities, including animal study
areas. Correct by ensuring the IACUC inspects the animal facilities at least once every six months from August 27, 2024
forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
